name: PeopleSoft: Pages should be designed assuming the user has an 800x600 monitor resolution
description: Despite the rule name aligned with PeopleSoft best pratices, the maximum Page Width and maximum Page Height are parameters that can be changed at will.
output:
This report lists all the Pages having a Width or a Height above the recommended size of 800*600.
It provides the following information: 
-  Page  full name.
- The associated value is the Page dimension (PageWidth*PageHeight)
rationale: Improve look & feel for the user
remediation: In application designer, open the page properties, in the tab "Use" and part "Page size", modify the size using the parameter custom size and use 800*600
